rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C101854

self.title: CDISC SDTM Cardiac Valvular Stenosis Severity Terminology

definition: A terminology codelist to describe the severity of cardiac valvular stenosis.
name: Cardiac Valvular Stenosis Severity
preferredTerm: CDISC SDTM Cardiac Valvular Stenosis Severity Terminology

terms.definition: The cardiac valve orifice is abnormally narrow, to a mild degree.
The cardiac valve orifice is abnormally narrow, to a moderate degree.
The cardiac valve orifice is not abnormally narrow.
The cardiac valve orifice is abnormally narrow, to a severe degree.
